title: Larty
author: Larty
created_time: March 17, 2023, 10:49:25 PMLast edit: March 17, 2023, 11:23:15 PM by Larty
content: Dear friends, we want to inform you that we are starting to test the mining of IMPERIAL token. Send us an email at mining@impcoin.org by specifying the number of your wallet, and 10 lucky people who will be randomly selected will receive 100 tokens for free. The terms of mining can be found in the WhitePaper on our website https://impcoin.org/ . Please correctly specify the wallet number that must be supported by the BNB Chain network (https://www.bnbchain.org/en/wallets). If the wrong wallet is provided, the tokens will be lost. Emails can be sent before 12 p.m. on 03/19/2023 UTC+1:00 time zone. Announcement of IMPERIAL token LINKThank you for your attention!
